Most affected individuals also have higher-than-normal levels of a substance called 2-oxoglutaric acid in their urine; these levels can fluctuate between normal and elevated.",GHR,DOORS syndrome
How many people are affected by DOORS syndrome ?,DOORS syndrome is a rare disorder; its prevalence is unknown. Approximately 50 affected individuals have been described in the medica
